text: Va kist sitamgortar az on ki duruƣe ʙa Alloh taolo ʙiʙandad jo ʙigujad: «Ba man [niz] vahj sudaast», dar hole ki hec vahje ʙa u narasidaast va [jo] kase, ki ʙigujad: «Man [ham] monandi on ci ki Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, [ʙarojaton] nozil mekunam»? Va [ej pajomʙar, sahnai havlnoke ast] agar hangomero ʙuʙini, ki [in] sitamgoron dar [tarsu] saxtihoi marg furu raftaand va faristagon [-i qaʙzi ruh] dasthojasonro [ʙa suji onon] kusudaand [va farjod mezanand]: «Conhoi xesro [az ʙadan] ʙerun dihed. Imruz ʙa [sazoi] on ci ʙa nohaq ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ meʙasted va dar ʙaroʙari ojotas takaʙʙur mekarded, ʙa azoʙi xorkunanda mucozot mesaved»
